shortDescription: UD-LT1 firmware Ver.2.1.8 and earlier and UD-LT1/EX firmware Ver.2.1.8 and earlier allow a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative account to execute arbitrary OS commands.
vulnerabilityName: UD-LT1 and UD-LT1/EX Firmware Admin Account Arbitrary OS Command Execution
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
